description: Not every message was made for us - and everything doesn’t need a response from us. It’s all at our fingertips but that doesn’t mean it’s ours. If it doesn’t sit right with you, keep going. If it’s not your truth, keep searching. If you have more questions, keep digging. It seems like we’re living in an era where we expect strangers on the internet to cater to us. To say what we want them to say. To be who we want them to be. To think the way we want them to think. To stop questioning, start obeying and to never go against the “norm”. We seem to think that everyone’s message is FOR us and that it better be exactly what we want it to be. I am not here for that 🚫 I’m also not here to make you like me. I will always be me. Regardless of how that makes you feel about me. And I hope you will always be you, because I like people that aren’t exactly like me 😉
